experience.title: Actuarial Intern
experience.description: Assisted the life insurance pricing team with data reconciliation and model validation using Excel and SQL. Performed sensitivity analysis on various interest rate scenarios to support quarterly reporting.

experience.title: Peer Tutor

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Managed high-volume data entry and digital filing for student accounts. Ensured accuracy of financial records and provided customer service to students regarding billing inquiries.
